name: Pugnac
description:
PUGNAC

Games Job Fair Autumn 2022 - Unreal Engine Programming Challenge.

You have diabetes. You have to kill the skeletons that come in waves. You need to hit the insulin needles you picked up on time before your blood glucose gets too high. You can collect chocolates when your blood glucose is too low, but it will raise your blood glucose. Your blood glucose also changes when you run or move too much. If your blood glucose is too high or too low, your health will decrease. If you keep your blood glucose stable and kill 30 wave skeletons, you will win the game.

Good luck...

Controller

Movement -> W A S D

Sprint -> Left Shift

Fire -> Left Mouse Button

Aim -> Right Mouse Button

Reload -> R

Equip / Swap Weapon -> E

Use Insulin -> F
